attributes.action: Scotland needs a public inquiry into the Salmond affair
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish people deserve the truth
attributes.background: There has been a systematic failure by the Scottish government to release critical evidence at the Holyrood inquiry

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
